Articles.Content:
I do! I also am a crazy Doc!

The user below me, is a user who posted BELOW this post.

Yes.

TUBM can help me learn German.

Nein, ich spreche nur wenig. High school last place I used it.

 

TUBM just used google translate to verify my sentence.

Nope. But I will.

TUBM has some candy

I think I have some jelly beans or something somewhere. Not with me right now, I am in a car.

TUBM is or has a sibling, relative, or parent who is a construction worker or crane operator.

No one in my family is a construction worker - although my uncle is a project manager.

TUBM was unaffected the the Forum's Kraken attack of 2013

Yep, I didn’t even have an account then, and wouldn’t get one until about 8 years later.

TUBM has read the rules

Yes, for this thread anyways.

TUBM has over 500 rep

yes

TUBM knows that you don't have to pay for something if you already paid for something

Yes, fighting with undisclosed company now over this very thing.

 

TUBM understands cryptocurrency

Nope, not at all.

TUBM lives near any Liebherr facility. I will consider "near" to be within 50 miles (I know that's not very "near").https://www.liebherr.com/en/int/about-liebherr/liebherr-worldwide/liebherr-worldwide.html

I wouldn't know.  About the most interesting thing I live near to is a factory that still manufactures cassette tapes. (In that regard, anyway.  I am also near Edwin Hubble's birthplace.)

 

TUBM could engage in a worthwhile conversation using nothing but Parks & Rec quotes.

I can do what I want.

Dman979

 

TUBM can engage in a worthwhile conversation using nothing but Apollo 13 quotes.

Nope, only watched the movie one time.

TUBM didn’t know that lunar rovers were used in the Chernobyl cleanup effort.

Edited June 17, 2021 by Admiral Fluffy
Spelling

No, I didn't.

TUBM doesn't know that there is a Sarens CC8800-1 at Chernobyl.

No I didn't.

 

TUBM remembers the Chernobyl event.

I do not, happened shortly before I was born.

 

TUBM is playing KSP at this very moment.

I wish.

TUBM has drawn something today

Quick doodle of a f-104 star fighter, one of my favourite jet fighters.

TUBM is in the pacific time zone.

no

TUBM have 5 games (excluding ksp).

Yesh more than five I do have.

TUBM lives in Europe 

Edited June 18, 2021 by Stormpilot

Afraid not. USA here.

 

TUBM is devious

I’m afraid not.

TUBM can engage in a lengthy conversation with me about Star Wars.

Yep. What do you want to talk about?
TUBM has read a National Geographic magazine

Yeah.

TUBM dose modle railroading.
